title: Banana split
ingredients: ['1 banana - peeled and cut lengthways', '1 scoop vanilla ice cream', '1 scoop strawberry ice cream', '1 scoop chocolate ice cream', 'Topping', '1-2 tbsp butterscotch sauce', '1-2 tbsp strawberry jam', '1-2 tbsp chocolate sauce', 'glace cherry', 'hundreds and thousands', 'whipped cream']
